patthana22.1:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:5.2: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #2
patthana22.1:6.1: Naakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:6.2: Naakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #2
patthana22.1:7.1: Naabyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:7.2: Naabyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #2
patthana22.1:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñca naabyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:8.2: Naakusalaṃ nahetuñca naabyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:8.3: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñca naakusalaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.1:9.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.1:10.1: Nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:10.2: Nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:10.3: Nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.1:11.1: Naakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:11.2: Naakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.1:11.3: Naakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.1:12.1: Naabyākataṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana22.1:13.1: Nakusalaṃ nanahetuñca naabyākataṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.1:14.1: Naakusalaṃ nanahetuñca naabyākataṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.1:15.1: Nakusalaṃ nanahetuñca naakusalaṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana22.1:16.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
